thread.title: Man City EDS sweating on Premier League Cup progress after draw vs Hull City
thread.title_full: Man City EDS sweating on Premier League Cup progress after draw vs Hull City

author: Ciaran Kelly
title: Man City EDS sweating on Premier League Cup progress after draw vs Hull City
text:
Man City EDS sweating on Premier League Cup progress after draw vs Hull City Manchester City EDS threw away a two-goal lead at the Eon Visual Media Stadium on Monday night.   Get Manchester City FC   
Man City EDS will need other results to go their way to make the last 16 of the Premier League Cup after a 2-2 draw with Hull on Monday night. 
Simon Davies' side could have booked their place in the knockout stages of the competition with a win at the Eon Visual Media Stadium. 
And things looked promising after City raced into a two-goal lead after just 20 minutes, thanks to goals from Lukas Nmecha and Denzeil Boadu. 
Hull's slack defending cost them on both occasions, but the Tigers pulled one back through striker Johan Ter Horst before half-time. Read More
